query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		domainownershipconnection {
			edges {
				node {
					_id,
					created_at,
					domain,
					id,
					may_cancel,
					secret,
					state,
					updated_at,
					verification_content,
					verification_method,
					verification_method_label,
					verified_at,
				},
			},
			nodes {
				_id,
				created_at,
				domain,
				id,
				may_cancel,
				secret,
				state,
				updated_at,
				verification_content,
				verification_method,
				verification_method_label,
				verified_at,
			},
			total_count,
		}
	}
